Context: Error when web credentials don't match Studio's existing credentials
Source: Studio failed to open because your web account credentials do not match the current Studio account credentials.
en-us: Studio failed to open because your web account credentials do not match the current Studio account credentials.

Context: This is shown as a header for an error dialog when Studio fails to launch
Source: Launch Failed
en-us: Launch Failed

Context: Error message is shown when the user doesn't have WebView2 installed. WebView2 is required for Studio to load the login page correctly. However, user can still use browser to login
Source: WebView2 installation required to load login page. Click here for installation details. Please login on the website.
en-us: WebView2 installation required to load login page. Click here for installation details. Please login on the website.

Context: Error message is shown when Studio fails to load WebView dialog for multiple times due to unexpected error
Source: An error occurred while launching Studio login. Please login on the website or try again later.
en-us: An error occurred while launching Studio login. Please login on the website or try again later.

Context: This is shown as a header for an error dialog when Studio fails to launch
Source: Login Failed
en-us: Login Failed

Context: Error message is shown when Studio fails to load WebView dialog for multiple times due to unexpected error
Source: An error occurred while logging into Studio. Please login on the website or try again later.
en-us: An error occurred while logging into Studio. Please login on the website or try again later.

Context: Error message that is shown when Studio fails to open due to credential mismatch, specifically when the cookie credential mismatch token credential
Source: An error occurred while logging into Studio. Please close all other Studio instances and try again.
en-us: An error occurred while logging into Studio. Please close all other Studio instances and try again.

Context: Error message that is shown when Studio fails to open due to credential mismatch, e.g. user login two instance with account A and B at the same time and only one of them will success, the other one will receive this error message
Source: Attempted login was unsuccessful because Studio is already logged in to another account. This Studio window will automatically close.
en-us: Attempted login was unsuccessful because Studio is already logged in to another account. This Studio window will automatically close.

Context: Error message that is shown when Studio fails to open due to credential mismatch, e.g. user launch Studio from the web but ended up using a different credential to login studio than the original one from the web
Source: Studio failed to open due to mismatched credentials. Please login with the current web account when launching from the web.
en-us: Studio failed to open due to mismatched credentials. Please login with the current web account when launching from the web.

Context: This is shown as a header for a dialog when Studio fails to login automatically from web due to lack of matching local credential
Source: Login to continue in Studio
en-us: Login to continue in Studio

Context: The text of the button for retrying the external login
Source: Retry Browser Login
en-us: Retry Browser Login

Context: The text for the external login button
Source: Login via Browser
en-us: Login via Browser

Context: The text for retrying launching Studio login
Source: Try Again
en-us: Try Again

Context: The text for offering the user to login Studio using embedded PKCE flow when launching from web but lack of matching local credential
Source: Login via Studio
en-us: Login via Studio

Context: Error message is shown when the original instance of Studio cannot be found during the external login flow
Source: An error occurred while logging into Studio. Please do not close Studio during login.
en-us: An error occurred while logging into Studio. Please do not close Studio during login.

Context: This error is shown to users when Studio fails initially because Studio could not connect.
Source: Studio is unable to connect. Please check your internet connection and try again.
en-us: Studio is unable to connect. Please check your internet connection and try again.

Source: Log Out
en-us: Log Out

Source: Logged Out
en-us: Logged Out

Source: Roblox Terms of Service
en-us: Roblox Terms of Service

Source: I Agree
en-us: I Agree

Source: Failed to fetch account info: %1
en-us: Failed to fetch account info: %1

Source: By clicking "%1", you are agreeing to
en-us: By clicking "%1", you are agreeing to

Source: Failed to accept user agreements. Please try to login again or contact support if problem persists.
en-us: Failed to accept user agreements. Please try to login again or contact support if problem persists.

Source: Are you sure you want to cancel? This will log you out and close all other running instances of Studio.
en-us: Are you sure you want to cancel? This will log you out and close all other running instances of Studio.

Source: Fail to get moderation status. Please try to login again or contact support if problem persists.
en-us: Fail to get moderation status. Please try to login again or contact support if problem persists.

Source: Closing down all open places...
en-us: Closing down all open places...

Source: User is moderated, please check website for more details.
en-us: User is moderated, please check website for more details.

Source: Unable to log out. Please save modified places in other Studio instances and then proceed with log out.
en-us: Unable to log out. Please save modified places in other Studio instances and then proceed with log out.
